MASTERNODES.NOMNOUTPUTS: ʻAʻole loaʻa nā hopena Masternode. No ka holo ʻana i kahi Masternode kūloko e hoʻouna pololei aku i 2,5,25,50 a i ʻole 100 miliona mau kālā i kāu alamat Masternode a kali no nā hōʻoia 15.

MASTERNODES.LOCALNOTRUNNING: Wahi Kū i ka Hale Kūloko

SIGNMESSAGE.SIGN_DESCRIPTION: Hiki iāʻoe ke hōʻailona i nā leka me kāu mau helu e hōʻike iāʻoe iho iā lākou. E mālama iāʻoe e hōʻailonaʻole i kahi mea paʻakikī, no ka ho'āʻoʻana o ka hoʻolālā phishing e hoʻowalewale iāʻoe e hōʻailona i kouʻike ma o lākou. E hōʻike wale i nā kūlana kiko'ī a pau āu iʻae ai.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFY_DESCRIPTION: E komo i ka helu inoa, ka leka uila (e hoʻopaʻa i ke kope o ka wāwae, nā hakahaka, nāʻaoʻao, a me nā mea'ē aʻe) a me ka hōʻailona ma lalo e hōʻoia i ka leka. E makaʻala i ka heluhelu houʻana i ka inoa ma mua o ka mea i kākauʻia ma ka pūlima i kākauʻia iho, iʻole eʻaeʻia e ka hōʻeuʻeu kanaka-i waena.
SIGNMESSAGE.VERIFYFAIL: Ua pau ka hōʻoia o ka memo

ABOUT.NUMBERBLOCKS: ʻO ka manawa o nā poʻomanaʻo

DEBUG.CONSOLEINFO: Welcome i ka punaewele Metrix Core RPC. E kōkua i keʻano no ka nānāʻana o nā kauoha e hiki mai ana.
DEBUG.CONSOLEWARNING: NĀ WARNING: Uaʻoi aku ka hana a nā māhoe, e'ōlelo ana i nā mea hoʻohana e kākau i nā kauoha maʻaneʻi, eʻaihue ana i kā lākou waihona pilikino. Mai hoʻohana i kēia leʻaleʻa me ka hoʻomaopopoʻole i ka hoʻopiliʻana i kahi kauoha.

PEERS.HEIGHT: Ke hoʻomaka nei i ka Block

REPAIR.INFOEXTERNAL: ʻAʻole hiki ke holo i kēia mau hana hana i ka manawa e holo aiʻo Metrix Core
REPAIR.INFO: E hoʻomaka hou nā pākuhi i lalo ma Metrix Core me nā koho line-line e hoʻoponopono ai i ke eke putele, e hoʻoponopono i nā hihia me nā kōnae blockchain hewa a iʻole ka hanaʻeleʻele / pili.
REPAIR.SALVAGEINFO: -salvagewallet: Ke ho'āʻo nei e hoʻihoʻi i nā kī kīnā mai kahi wallet.dat hewa.
REPAIR.RESCANBUTTON: E mālama i nā pūnaewele pane
REPAIR.RESCANINFO: -rescan: E hoʻoholo i ka pahuke no ka hana pilikino i nalowale.
REPAIR.RECOVER1INFO: -zapwallettxes = 1: Hoʻopili i nā hana i kahi kālai'āina (mālama i nāʻikepili helu, e like me ka mea nāna i mālama i kaʻike)
REPAIR.RECOVER2INFO: -zapwallettxes = 2: Hoʻopuka i nā hana mai kahi kālai'āina (waiho i nāʻikepiliʻekolu)
REPAIR.UPGRADEWALLETINFO: -upgradewallet: Hoʻoponopono i ke eke putele i ka hōʻano hou loa i ka hoʻomaka. (E nānā i kēia:ʻaʻole kēia hōʻike o ka pēke pono'ī!)
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXBUTTON: E kūkulu hou i ka helu
REPAIR.REBUILDINDEXINFO: -reindex: Rebuild mokuna blockchain mai nā kōnae o blk000 o kēia manawa.
REPAIR.BOOTSTRAPINFO: Ke hoʻoiho nei i nā file Metrix blockchain mai metrixcoin.com a bootstrap i kāu hoʻonohonoho ʻana. Ma muli o kāu pili pūnaewele pili i kēia hiki ke lawe i ka 10 mau minuke i hoʻokahi mau hola
REPAIR.SYNCFROMSTARTINFO: Hoʻopau i kāu mau faila blockchain kūloko a resync mai ka palaka genesis.
REPAIR.RESTARTCOREINFO: Hoʻomaka i ka Metrix Core inā ua holo mua ana a hoʻomaka i ka Metrix Core inā ʻaʻole holo.
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREBUTTON: Hoʻihoʻi hou i ka Metrix Core
REPAIR.REINSTALLCOREINFO: Hoʻopau i kāu Metrix Core kaiaulu a kau hou iā ia mai nā kikowaena Metrix.

He polokalamu hoʻokolohua kēia.
I kiolaʻia i lalo o ka palapala polokalamu lako polokalamu MIT / X11, e nānā i ka pūnaewele e pili nei COPYING a iʻole http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php.

Aia kēia huahana i ka polokalamu i hoʻolālāʻia e ka OpenSSL Project no ka hoʻohanaʻana i ka Toolkit OpenSSL (https://www.openssl.org) a me ka software hoʻopukapiha i kākauʻia e Eric Young (eay@cryptsoft.com) a me UPnP pūnaewele i kākauʻia e Thomas Bernard.
HELP.ABOUTALTITUDE:
Kuleana kope © 2019 Nā Metrix mea hoʻomohala

Hoʻopukaʻia kēia polokalamu ma lalo o ka palapala GPL-3.0, e nānā i https://github.com/TheLindaProjectInc/Altitude/blob/master/LICENSE no kaʻike hou aku.

PROMPT.ENTERPASSPHRASETITLE: E komo i kahi kīpili o kāu putele
PROMPT.CLIENTUPDATEINFO: Loaʻa kahi loiloi no Metrix Core. Makemakeʻoe e hoʻokomo i kēia manawa?
PROMPT.WALLETUPDATEINFO: Loaʻa kahi hoʻolālā no Altitude. Makemakeʻoe e kiʻi i kēia manawa?
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDINFO: Ua halaʻo Conneinda iā Metrix Core. Hiki iāʻoe ke ho'ōki i ke pēke a hoʻomaka i ka Metrix Core o loko.
PROMPT.CLIENTSTOPPEDBUTTONSTART: E hoʻomaka i ka Metrix Core
PROMPT.ENCRYPTEDCONTENT: Pono e hoʻololi i nā pūnaewele mua āu i hana ai i kāu pēpena me ka pūnaewele pēpē i hoʻopili houʻia. No nā kumu palekana, e lilo nā pūnaewele mua o ke kōpena putele hoʻopunipuniʻole i meaʻole i ka manawa e hoʻomaka aiʻoe e hoʻohana i ke pēpena hou.
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDTITLE: Ua paniʻo Metrix Core me ka manaʻoʻole
PROMPT.CLIENTCLOSEDUNEXPECTEDINFO: Aia kahi pilikia me ka Metrix Core nāna i hoʻopau iā ia e pau. A manaʻo ʻia e nānā i kāu file debug.log no nā pilikia.
PROMPT.CLIENTINVALIDCONFIGINFO: ʻO kāu metrix.conf kahi hoʻonohonoho masternode kūponoʻole e hiki ai iā Metrix Core ke hele koke. Eʻoluʻolu e nānā i kēia faila.
PROMPT.ADDREMOTEMNTXINDEX: ʻO ka papa inoa Masternode Trx
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDTITLE: Ua hōʻole ka Metrix Core Bootstrap
PROMPT.BOOTSTRAPFAILEDINFO: Ua pilikia kahi bootstrapping Metrix Core. Manaʻo ʻia e nānā i kāu file log Altitude no nā pilikia.
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDTITLE: Hoʻopau ʻole ka hoʻomaka ʻana ʻo Metrix
PROMPT.STARTUPFAILEDINFO: Aia ka hoʻomaka i ka Metrix Core. Manaʻo ʻia e nānā i kāu file log Altitude no nā pilikia.
PROMPT.CLIENTUNKNOWNERRORTITLE: ʻO ka Hōʻea ʻo Metrix Core
PROMPT.CLIENTUNKNOWNERRORINFO: He pilikia ma ka kamaʻilio ʻana me Metrix Core. A manaʻo ʻia e nānā i kāu file debug.log no nā pilikia.
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORTITLE: E hōʻoia i ke kākau inoa ʻole ʻana o ke kiaʻāina
PROMPT.UNENROLLGOVERNORCONTENT: Makemake ʻoe makemake e wehe inoa i kou Kiaʻāina? ʻAʻole hiki iā ʻoe ke koho balota i ke aupuni kaulahao.

ADDRESSBOOK.TITLE: Puka Buke Helu

DESKTOPNOTIFICATIONS.NEWTRANSACTION_TITLE_MASTERNODE: Loaʻa iā ia ka uku o nā mākua

GOVERNANCE.NOTGOVERNORDETAIL: Aia ke kuleana o nā kiaʻāina no ke koho ʻana i nā kālā koina a me nā hoʻololi ʻo blockchain. Hiki iā ʻoe ke lilo i kiaʻāina ma ka laka ʻana i ka collateral kūpono i ke kuʻina Aupuni.
GOVERNANCE.CONFIRMENROLL: Oe ke kokoke mai nei i mea kakau no ke Kiaaina. Hoʻouna kēia i kahi mea kūʻai aku me ka mea i koi ʻia i ka ʻekena hoʻokele. ʻAʻole hiki iā ʻoe ke wehe i kēlā me kēia manawa.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL1: Aia ke kuleana o nā kiaʻāina no ke koho ʻana i nā kālā koina a me nā hoʻololi ʻo blockchain.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL2: No ka noho ʻana he Kiaʻāina e pono ʻoe e komo i ka liʻiliʻi ma ka papa koho 1 ma kēlā me kēia 30 lā.
GOVERNANCE.ISGOVERNORDETAIL3: Inā ʻaʻohe mea e koho ai i ia a hiki iā ʻoe ke hoʻomau mau i kāu helu kau ʻana ma ka hoʻouna ʻana i kahi ping ikaika.
GOVERNANCE.GOVERNORVOTEMATURITYSUFFIX: a hiki i ka oʻo ʻana

HOME.INFOLINE1: Once loaʻa iā ʻoe kahi helu waihona BTC, hoʻouna ʻia kekahi BTC i kēlā helu wahi no MRX i kāu helu MRX i koho ʻia.
HOME.INFOLINE2-1: Maʻalahi loa ka hana i loko o hoʻokahi hola e pili ana i nā manawa poloka Bitcoin.
HOME.INFOLINE2-2: Ma ka hoʻohana ʻana i kēia lawelawe, ʻae ʻoe ʻaʻole ʻoe e noho i nā ʻāina i helu ʻia
HOME.INFOLINE3: Ke hoʻomaʻemaʻe kāu waihona BTC e loaʻa iā ʻoe kāu MRX i kāu wahi i koho ʻia.
HOME.INFOLINE4: No ka ʻike hou aku e kipa aku ai
